metadata.description: Yebot's Rad CC Plugins (a Claude Code Marketplace)

plugins.name: git-github-operations
plugins.description: Git & Github Operations - Streamlined git and GitHub workflow commands

plugins.name: agent-architect
plugins.description: Agent Architect - Tools and templates for designing Claude Code subagents

plugins.name: github-issues
plugins.description: GitHub Issues Management - Elite agent for managing GitHub Issues using the gh CLI

plugins.name: backlog-md-cli
plugins.description: Backlog.md Task Management - CLI-first workflow orchestration for Git-native project management with strict file naming enforcement

plugins.name: astro-content-author
plugins.description: Astro Content Author - Comprehensive toolkit for creating and managing content in Astro projects including markdown files, content collections, images, data fetching, and Astro DB

plugins.name: documentation-tools
plugins.description: Documentation Tools - Utilities for managing and organizing repository documentation for optimal AI agent context, with CLAUDE.md to AGENTS.md conversion

plugins.name: jira-cli
plugins.description: Jira CLI Expert - Comprehensive toolkit for managing Jira issues, sprints, and workflows using ankitpokhrel/jira-cli with minimal trial and error

plugins.name: juce-dev-team
plugins.description: JUCE Dev Team - Advanced features: DAW compatibility testing, performance profiling, architecture patterns, comprehensive DAW guide

plugins.name: apple-notes-cli
plugins.description: Apple Notes CLI Expert - Manage Apple Notes via command-line with agents for CRUD operations, organization, templates, and export workflows

plugins.name: github-project-manager
plugins.description: GitHub Project Manager - Comprehensive project-first workflow management using GitHub Projects V2 via gh CLI with automation, field management, and modern project tracking

plugins.name: webapp-team
plugins.description: Webapp Team - A virtual web app development team with 13 specialized agents for engineering, product, design, growth, and operations including Prisma ORM expertise

plugins.name: backlog-md
plugins.description: Comprehensive Backlog.md integration - markdown-native task management with MCP support, specialized subagents for task alignment and planning, and workflow automation hooks

plugins.name: linear-clerk
plugins.description: Linear Clerk - Linear integration for backlog, task, and project management using linearis CLI

plugins.name: simbl
plugins.description: SIMBL Tools - Lightweight companion for SIMBL CLI backlog manager with task hygiene, quick capture, and reduced context-switching
